T02TD3373E:48b-1: ma h'a ts'i na kra ma t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02TD3373E:48b-3: rgya nag po'i rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3373E:48b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3373E:48b-5: g-yon pa brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis ro yi snying ga mnan cing mi bzad ha has dgod pa'i mchog / phyag na ral gri autpal gri gug bsnams shing h'um gi sa bon las ni rab tu byung //
T02TD3373E:48b-6: mi'u thung sngo zhing yangs la ral ba ser po cod pan bcings shing mchog gi klu dang ldan //
T02TD3373E:48b-7: 'jig rten gsum gyi mi shes thod pa la bkod 'joms shing drag po'i sgrol ma rang nyid do //
T02TD3373E:48b-8: sgrol ma 'jig rten gsum sgrol ma //
T02TD3373E:48b-9: rgya nag rim 'ongs la btud de //
T02TD3373E:48b-10: bla ma'i man ngag ji lta bar //
T02TD3373E:48b-11: de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod //
T02TD3373E:48b-12: rtags gcig gam ni dur khrod dang //
T02TD3373E:48b-13: khyim stong dag ni thams cad du //
T02TD3373E:48b-14: srid gsum mthar byed rig pa ni //
T02TD3373E:48b-15: der gnas rnal 'byor bas bsgrub bya //
T02TD3373E:48b-16: 'jam pa'i nang tshangs can gnas shing //
T02TD3373E:48b-17: gzhan yang 'jam pa dag la ni //
T02TD3373E:48b-18: shing stan la sogs mnyam gnas la //
T02TD3373E:48b-19: dngos grub mchog ni sgrub par byed //
T02TD3373E:48b-20: skad cig rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD3373E:48b-21: legs mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje gsum //
T02TD3373E:48b-22: gnas gsum du ni bsam par bya //
T02TD3373E:48b-23: de nas 'od zer rnam par spros //
T02TD3373E:48b-24: srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can rnams //
T02TD3373E:48b-25: yang ni gsal bar byas nas su //
T02TD3373E:48b-26: bsdus te yang ni sna tshogs kun //
T02TD3373E:48b-27: stong pa nyid du bsam par bya //
T02TD3373E:48b-28: de nas rgyal ba'i sngags brjod do //
T02TD3373E:48b-29: aom sh'u n+ya la sogs rang bzhin no //
T02TD3373E:48b-30: de nas bar snang dag la bsam //
T02TD3373E:48b-32: da yi steng du bsam bya ba //
T02TD3373E:48b-33: t'am las padma'i steng du ni //
T02TD3373E:48b-34: yang ni de dbus bsam bya ba //
T02TD3373E:48b-35: h'um yig sngon po dra ba'i 'od //
T02TD3373E:48b-36: de nas h'um skyes blta bya ba //
T02TD3373E:48b-37: gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan pa'i //
T02TD3373E:49a-2: bdag nyid sgrol ma dang mnyam pa //
T02TD3373E:49a-3: mi bzad g-yon brkyang pa yi zhabs //
T02TD3373E:49a-4: mgo bo'i phreng ba 'phyang ba ste //
T02TD3373E:49a-6: padma sngon pos brgyan pa ste //
T02TD3373E:49a-7: bzang mo zhal gcig spyan gsum ma //
T02TD3373E:49a-8: mi bzad ha ha'i rnam pa'i 'od //
T02TD3373E:49a-9: rab tu dgyes pas ro la zhon //
T02TD3373E:49a-10: klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD3373E:49a-11: spyan ni dmar zhing zlum pa ste //
T02TD3373E:49a-12: stag gi pags pas rked pa dkris //
T02TD3373E:49a-13: lang tsho gsar pa phun sum tshogs //
T02TD3373E:49a-14: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD3373E:49a-16: phyag g-yas ral gri gri gug ste ;
T02TD3373E:49a-18: kham pa gyen 'greng ral gcig ma //
T02TD3373E:49a-19: dbu rgyan mi bskyod brgyan pa bsam //
T02TD3373E:49a-20: bsgoms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa na //
T02TD3373E:49a-22: gal te blun zhing rmongs pas kyang //
T02TD3373E:49a-23: bsgoms pa'i ri la ched byed na //
T02TD3373E:49a-25: 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya //
T02TD3373E:49a-26: yi ge gsum gyi sngags chen po //
T02TD3373E:49a-27: phat ni mtha' ru snying gar gnas //
T02TD3373E:49a-28: 'od zer lnga dang mnyam par ldan //
T02TD3373E:49a-29: mi shes bud shing bsregs pa'o //
T02TD3373E:49a-31: de yi bsdu ba'i cho ga brjod //
T02TD3373E:49a-32: dang po sa yi phar phyogs sbyin //
T02TD3373E:49a-33: dbyangs yig bzhi pa rnam par brgyan //
T02TD3373E:49a-35: thig le zla tshes yang dag ldan //
T02TD3373E:49a-36: de nas yi ge tram sbyin bya //
T02TD3373E:49a-37: bzhi pa nyid kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD3373E:49a-38: ring po dag dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD3373E:49a-39: h'um yig yang ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD3373E:49a-40: phat kyi yi ge de nas sbyin //
T02TD3373E:49a-41: yongs rdzogs grub pa'i sngags nyid do //
T02TD3373E:49a-42: mkhas pas ral gri gnas su ni //
T02TD3373E:49a-43: mi yi rus pa'i phreng ba bsam //
T02TD3373E:49a-44: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD3373E:49a-45: sngags mchog yang dag bzlas par bya //
T02TD3373E:49a-46: brtan pa'i sems kyis rtogs gyur na //
T02TD3373E:49a-47: tshigs bcad mkhan ni ston pa ru //
T02TD3373E:49a-48: rtag tu bsgom pa goms pa yis //
T02TD3373E:49a-49: de nyid the tshom med par 'gyur //
T02TD3373E:49a-50: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs byas pa las //
T02TD3373E:49a-51: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02TD3373E:49a-52: rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i ston pa ru //
T02TD3373E:49a-53: de yis srog chags thams cad shog / de 'dir blo don sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD3373E:49a-54: rtag pa'i rdo rjes byas pa la //
T02TD3373E:49b-0: mkhas pa zab mo @49b 'di la ni //
T02TD3373E:49b-1: sgrub thabs la ni bzod par rigs //
T02TD3373E:49b-2: rgya nag po'i rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02TD3373E:49b-3: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
T02TD3373E:49b-4: khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus so//
